name: Rest Countries
description: A website showing all the countries and some of their information by their flag.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Online Rock Paper Scissors game where the user can play against computer. User can also play a bonus style, called Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock.

name: Audiophile
description: An e-commerce website focus on the sale of headphones, speakers, and earphone.

name: Password Generator
description: An application for user to generate password base on selected choices.

name: Jokes Board
description: A website focus on getting jokes from 4 different APIs. User can like jokes created from the APIs.

name: To Do List
description: A to do list website where user can add items to the list and then can be cross out or remove from the list.

name: Crime Report
description: A Google Map showcasing report of crimes from the San Francisco Open Data.

name: Location
description: An application to notify users on when to move their car to prevent getting tickets.
